scenes.background: Bob looks at Monica and you, raising an eyebrow.
scenes.description: 'Do you think Emma and Sam will ever agree on anything?'

options.text: They might not agree, but we can find a solution that works for everyone.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the disagreement and suggested a collaborative solution, showing good perception and empathy but moderate social skills and self-regulation.

options.text: They both have strong opinions, but we'll figure it out.
options.analysis: You expressed optimism and confidence in resolving the issue, showing good self-regulation and social skills but moderate empathy and perception.

options.text: It's unlikely given their differences, but we have to try.
options.analysis: You pointed out the difficulty in reaching a consensus, showing good perception and motivation but lower social skills.
